helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.contactSupportDesc: Get in touch with our support team for personalized assistance
helpCenter.userGuidesDesc: Step-by-step guides to help you navigate the platform
helpCenter.documentationDesc: Detailed documentation about features and processes

getStarted.question: How do I get started with NeuroSwarm?
getStarted.answer: Getting started with NeuroSwarm is easy! Just follow these steps:
steps: Create an account or sign in if you already have one
Join your first swarm and start contributing

earnings.question: How do earnings and payments work?
earnings.answer: Earnings are calculated based on your contributions to swarms and tasks. Payments are processed at the end of each cycle, typically monthly. You can track your earnings in the dashboard and withdraw funds once they reach the minimum threshold.

skills.question: What skills do I need to participate?
skills.answer: NeuroSwarm welcomes participants with various skill levels. Different swarms may require different expertise, from data labeling to complex AI training. You can browse opportunities that match your skills and experience level.

security.question: How secure is my data on NeuroSwarm?
security.answer: We take data security very seriously. All personal information is encrypted and stored securely. We comply with global data protection regulations and never share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

global.question: Can I participate from anywhere in the world?
global.answer: Yes! NeuroSwarm is a global platform. You can participate from anywhere with an internet connection. However, certain tasks or payment methods may have regional restrictions due to regulatory requirements.
